channel.title: VariantsPrediction on Monash Bioinformatics Platform
channel.description: Recent content in VariantsPrediction on Monash Bioinformatics Platform

item.title: Classifying DNA mismatch repair variant pathogenicity using protein structure and function predictions
item.description: The DNA mismatch repair (MMR) mechanism plays an important role in maintaining genome integrity by correcting small mutations that can arise from DNA damage or from mistakes made during replication and recombination
